Class Body

java.lang.Object
us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics.Body
public class Body extends Object
Stores and updates physical information about a body. Updates information such as position and velocity as time passes and as forces are applied to the body.

  • Constructor Summary

    Class constructor with all values specified by the user.

    void
    updateTrail()
    Updates the body's trail if: The direction of the body's velocity has changed by at least the trail resolution The body has traversed at least one-tenth of the initial simulation bounds Adds the body's current position to the list of trail vectors and removes the oldest trail element if the trail is at its max length.

  • Constructor Details

    • Body

      public Body(Vector3D pos, Vector3D vel, double mass, double density, String name, Color c)
      Class constructor with all values specified by the user. Assigns specified values to their corresponding fields and generates an id and initializes the trail.
      Parameters:
      pos - Initial position of the body
      vel - Initial velocity of the body
      mass - Initial mass of the body
      density - Density of the body used to calculate radius
      name - Name of the body
      c - Color used for rendering the body

  • Method Details

    • merge

      public void merge(Body other)
      Merges the specified body into this body by summing the masses, averaging the densities, and updating the radius.
      Parameters:
      other - The other body to merge into this body

    • updateTrail

      public void updateTrail()
      Updates the body's trail if:
      • The direction of the body's velocity has changed by at least the trail resolution
      • The body has traversed at least one-tenth of the initial simulation bounds
      Adds the body's current position to the list of trail vectors and removes the oldest trail element if the trail is at its max length.

    • getKineticEnergy

      public double getKineticEnergy()
      Calculates the kinetic energy of the body using the formula: KE = 0.5 * mass * velocity^2.
      Returns:
      The kinetic energy of the body as a double

    • getTrail

      public LinkedList<Vector3D> getTrail()
      Getter method for the body's trail data.
      Returns:
      The ArrayList of trail points

    • getState

      public BodyHistory getState()
      Retrieves the current state of the body represented by a BodyHistory object.
      Returns:
      The current state of the body as a BodyHistory instance

    • getMass

      public double getMass()
      Getter method for the body's mass.
      Returns:
      The body's mass

    • toStringArray

      public ArrayList<String> toStringArray()
      Formats the body's attributes into a string list. Each array item is a line.
      Returns:
      A string array representing the body's attributes

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Formats the body's name with its id in parentheses next to it.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object o)
      Two bodies are identical if they share the same unique id.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
